name: Mondo Media
overview: Mondo Media, Inc. designs, produces, and distributes animation mini shows for teens and young adults. It distributes its shows through Internet, podcasts, and mobile. The company has operations in the United States, Western Europe, Eastern Europe, Asia, Latin America, and Australia/New Zealand. Mondo Media, Inc. was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in San Francisco, California.
